archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.6.4: Avoiding information risks should involve a decision by a senior individual to cancel or postpone a particular project or initiative that introduces a risk which is above the organisation's risk appetite/tolerance (e.g. adopting a particular technology, allowing external access, offering products in a new market (or jurisdiction) or providing a new service to customers).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
